task_40.description: Place the blue tissue between the red cup and the green cup
task_40.required_objects: blue tissue, red plastic cup, green paper cup
task_40.initial_setup: The red cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge. The green cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A yellow plastic cup is tilted and resting on its side near the center.
task_40.final_state: The blue tissue is flat and positioned between the red and green cups, 10 cm from each. The yellow cup is upright on the far left corner.
